text: @WhiteHouse 💔 116,257 AMERICANS DEAD‼️🇺🇸😷 Politics ABOVE Public Health By registering to attend, supporters "are acknowledging that an inherent risk of exposure to COVID-19 exists "voluntarily assume all risks and agree to not hold the Trump campaign, the venue or other organizers liable!
